name: Puzzling Penguins
description:
Puzzling Penguins is a challenging and entertaining penguin themed game.
The game contains 100 custom designed levels that will keep you continuously thinking.

As the game progresses the levels increase in difficulty and new strategies are needed in order to solve the puzzle.

Test your intellect and problem solving skills now.

Features:

- 100 Custom Designed Levels
- 8 different backgrounds
- Level select screen to track your progress
- Saves your progress automatically
- High quality animation
- In game tutorial
- Soundfx
- Ability to turn off soundfx
- Ability to listen to your own music
- Reset the current level button
- Hours of fun
- Invisible objects in later levels

*some advertisements may not be suitable for younger audiences.
